info.title: NANO REST AGENT API
info.description:
# Documentation This documentation provides detailed information about accessible endpoints, endpoints request and response structure and error codes. For more information about authentication, error handling and suggested processes, please visit our [Rest services](https://wiki.bas.lt/display/NM/Rest+services) at our [Wiki](https://wiki.bas.lt/display/NM/NANO+knowledge+base). # Breaking vs Non-breaking changes All web service changes are categorized into either breaking changes or non-breaking changes. We make every effort to implement changes as non-breaking, and do not generally notify clients about non-breaking changes. However, there are situations that may require breaking changes, for such cases release notes for will contain necessary information. Bellow is a non-exhaustive list of what we consider breaking and what a non-breaking change. ## Breaking changes * Removal of API or functionality * Removal of property from the request (even if they are considered optional) * Addition of new mandatory property to the request * Addition of new mandatory query parameter * Change of the URI of the API, such as host name, port or path * Change of request or response property name * Change of property data type * Change of the structure in request or response (e.g. making an existing property a child of some other property) * Change of request validation logic, making it more restrictive * Change of HTTP code in response (e.g. 201 -> 204 or 400 -> 404 or 200 -> 404 or 404->204 and similar) * Change of error code in the response (e.g. IncorrectParameter -> InvalidParameter) * Change of already supported enumerated values or meaning of those values * Change of default behaviour when calling without newly added query parameters * Making of a previously optional properties in request mandatory * Making of headers in request mandatory ## Non-breaking changes * Removal or loosening of constraint for input property validated via server-side business logic * Addition of new functionality or new API * Addition of new Method (e.g. PUT, PATCH if previously was not available) * Addition of new optional request property or nested property to existing API methods * Addition of new properties to existing API responses * Addition of new optional header parameters * Addition of new optional query parameters * Addition of new event types * Addition of new error messages and error details while keeping old error code * Change of error response message and details while keeping old error code * Change of the order of properties in existing API responses * Change of the length or format of object IDs or other opaque strings * Change of mandatory fields to optional fields in an existing API * Reducing or extending of enumeration range (when parameters for range control are not used) * Change of rate limiting rules

Be a tolerant reader and also define default behaviour for unexpected cases.

Articles worth reading:

  • Martin Fowler - https://martinfowler.com/bliki/TolerantReader.html

post.description: Open account for customer for specified current account product. If applicant or holder party IDs are absent then initial party ID is used. Preconditions of account opening for customer are set in current account product's settings. If the preconditions are not met, service will return an error describing the missing requirements. System checks if specified GL account is assigned to the product that is specified in the request. Related checks are made to ensure that private person would not have corporate account and vice versa. Current account subtype Segregated account can be set in product settings. **Note:** parameters related to statement delivery are not working and are marked as deprecated, please avoid using them.

get.description:
- blocks - PLAIS blocks or account blocks that can be added in Nano Front.
- debts - Customer debts. For example it can be for account servicing when the customer does not have money in the account.
- holds - Reservations (holds) for Card authorizations.
- reservations - Reserved account amount for transactions.

- blocks - PLAIS blocks or account blocks that can be added in Nano Front.
- debts - Customer debts. For example it can be for account servicing when the customer does not have money in the account.
- holds - Reservations (holds) for Card authorizations.
- reservations - Reserved account amount for transactions.
Returns account statement containing list of debit and credit operations.

accountPartyId is mandatory applicantPartyId is optional cardHolderPartyId is optional filter is optional. If filter is not provided **all cards** with all statuses are returned. For Private person: accountPartyId, applicantPartyId and cardHolderPartyId is the same. For Corporate: accountPartyId â‰  applicantPartyId, for business customers, the applicantPartyId must be authorized to accountPartyId to return cards list. If accountPartyId = applicantPartyId no cards returned. - accountBalance - available balance - blocksBalance - PLAIS blocks or account blocks balance that can be added in Nano Front. - debtsBalance - Customer debts balance. For example it can be for account servicing when the customer does not have money in the account. - holdsBalance - Reservations(holds) for Card authorizations balance. - reservationsBalance - Reserved account balance for transactions.

parameters.name: applicantPartyId
parameters.description: Unique party identification value for service usage

get.description:
Get account balance.

Service returns balance of account by provided account number.
Account must exist in any agents' card product as a account, pc fee account or fee account

get.summary: Returns is new card allowed for CrmParty.
get.description: Returns is new card allowed for CrmParty. accountPartyId is mandatory cardHolderPartyId is mandatory for corporate account cardProductId is not mandatory. If cardProductId is provided, service will check only exact product by cardProductId, otherwise service will check all existing card products cardProductType is not mandatory. If cardProductType provided, service will check if new card allowed for CrmParty by cardProductType (VIRTUAL,DEBIT). If cardProductType and cardProductId parameters are provided service validates, if cardProductId provided with correct value and if cardProductId matches cardProductType, otherwise service returns error. accountNumber is optional. If no accountNumber is provided, service does not validate **current accounts**. If accountNumber is provided, service validates if **current account** by given accountNumber matches requirements.

post.description: Service orders plastic card cardProductId is not mandatory if cardProductType is provided. When cardProductType is provided, service takes cardProductId from mongo config, e.g. "defaultCardProductId:debit:AGENT_ID" cardProductType is not mandatory if cardProductId is provided. cardDeliveryMethod values: 1. POST 2. REGISTERED_POST 3. COURIER cardDeliveryType values: 1. AGENCY 2. ADDRESS cardProductType values: 1. DEBIT 2. CREDIT 3. INSTANT 4. BUSINESS 5. CORPORATE 6. VIRTUAL 7. CORPORATE_VIRTUAL 8. PRE_PAID Order plastic card validations: - Service checks if current account is found by provided **accountNumber** - Service checks if current account holder's id equals to provided **accountPartyId** - Service checks if current account product exists by **productId** from current account - Service checks if CrmParty's with **accountPartyId** cards quantity doesn't exceed maximum cards quantity of provided current account - Service validates CrmParty's with **accountPartyId** residence country - Service checks if current account's status is active - Service checks if CrmParty with **applicantPartyId** is not suspended and not "person non grata" - Service takes **card3dsPhoneNumber** value from CrmParty's **cardHolderPartyId** mainPhoneNumber. - Service takes **card3dsCredentials** value from CrmParty's **cardHolderPartyId** mainPhoneNumber with credential3dsType=OTPSMS - Service checks if card product is found - Service checks if card product is active - Service validates CrmParty's with **accountPartyId** and CrmParty's with **applicantPartyId** profile completeness - Service checks if cards product type's party type equals to CrmParty's with **accountPartyId** party type - Service checks if **accountPartyId** equals to **applicantPartyId** when card product type's party type is PRIVATE_PERSON - Service checks if CrmParty's with **accountPartyId** authorized person is CrmParty with **applicantPartyId** when card product type's party type is ORGANIZATION

put.summary: Confirm plastic card success activation (that occurred on GIP UI).

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: If request parameter "language" provided with incorrect value Iframe window will be in en-US language.

put.summary: Confirm plastic card PIN success set (that occurred on GIP UI).

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: If request parameter "language" provided with incorrect value Iframe window will be in en-US language.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: If request parameter "language" provided with incorrect value Iframe window will be in en-US language.

put.summary: Send SMS OTP to card holder for plastic card PIN view.

get.description: At least one parameter must be provided. If one or more parameters provided they must be with correct values, otherwise service will returns error message. accountPartyResidenceCountries - allowed countries from **CARD_ISSUING_EEA** and **CARD_ISSUING_OTHER** country groups. Allowed format ISO-3166 Alpha-2. Examples: (LT, LV, EE, GR...) accountPartyBusinessCategory field possible values are listed in (mongo -> nano-backoffice -> glossary -> _id:"business-categories")

post.description: Service orders virtual card cardProductId is not mandatory if cardProductType is provided. When cardProductType is provided, service takes cardProductId from mongo config, e.g. "defaultCardProductId:virtual:AGENT_ID" cardProductType is not mandatory if cardProductId is provided. cardProductType values: 1. DEBIT 2. CREDIT 3. INSTANT 4. BUSINESS 5. CORPORATE 6. VIRTUAL 7. CORPORATE_VIRTUAL 8. PRE_PAID Order virtual card validations: - Service checks if current account is found by provided **accountNumber** - Service checks if current account holder's id equals to provided **accountPartyId** - Service checks if current account product exists by **productId** from current account - Service checks if CrmParty's with **accountPartyId** cards quantity doesn't exceed maximum cards quantity of provided current account - Service validates CrmParty's with **accountPartyId** residence country - Service checks if current account's status is active - Service checks if CrmParty with **applicantPartyId** is not suspended and not "person non grata" - Service takes **card3dsPhoneNumber** value from CrmParty's **cardHolderPartyId** mainPhoneNumber. - Service takes **card3dsCredentials** value from CrmParty's **cardHolderPartyId** mainPhoneNumber with credential3dsType=OTPSMS - Service checks if card product is found - Service checks if card product is active - Service checks if card product type is VIRTUAL - Service validates CrmParty's with **accountPartyId** and CrmParty's with **applicantPartyId** profile completeness - Service checks if cards product type's party type equals to CrmParty's with **accountPartyId** party type - Service checks if **accountPartyId** equals to **applicantPartyId** when card product type's party type is PRIVATE_PERSON - Service checks if CrmParty's with **accountPartyId** authorized person is CrmParty with **applicantPartyId** when card product type's party type is ORGANIZATION

get.description: - accountBalance - available balance - blocksBalance - PLAIS blocks or account blocks balance that can be added in Nano Front. - debtsBalance - Customer debts balance. For example it can be for account servicing when the customer does not have money in the account. - holdsBalance - Reservations(holds) for Card authorizations balance. - reservationsBalance - Reserved account balance for transactions. cardId = card id in PC (Processing Center)

put.summary: Confirm card 3DS password success change (that occurred on GIP UI).

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: If request parameter "language" provided with incorrect value Iframe window will be in en-US language.

post.description: - cardId - card id in PC - Available cardStopCause values: [STOPPED, LOST, STOLEN] - Temporary block - cardStopCause:STOPPED - Permanently block - cardStopCause:LOST/STOLEN

put.description: Service closes card contract and current account if request parameter **closeCurrentAccount** = true closeCurrentAccount is optional and by default is **false** Card contract validations: - Service validates if card contract status is not **CLOSED** If **closeCurrentAccount** = true, before closing card contract, service validates current account: - Service validates if current account is not used as a fee account, as a deposit service account, as a loan service account, as a mobile payment account - Service validates if current account is active - Service validates if current account is not blocked for debit and credit operations - Service validates if current account has zero balance - Service validates if current account doesn't have pending transfers, overdrafts, debts

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: If request parameter "language" provided with incorrect value Iframe window will be in en-US language.

put.summary: Send SMS OTP to card holder for plastic or virtual card details view.

post.description:
Service loads current account linked with card

Load card service validations:
- Service validates card contract found by **cardId** status: Card status must be ACTIVE or LOCKED or READY_TO_ACTIVATE
- Service checks if **prefundingAccount** is provided in current account product
- Service validates prefundingAccount:
   - Service checks if there are enough funds in prefundingAccount
   - Service checks if prefundingAccount is ACTIVE
   - Service checks if prefundingAccount is not blocked for debit/all operations
- Service validates current account linked with card found by **cardId**:
   - Service checks if current account is ACTIVE
   - Service checks if current account is not blocked for credit/all operations
- Service validates if prefunding account holder party is active
- Service validates if current account party is active

put.description:
**Endpoint supports following security parameters**:
- ALLOW_CONTACTLESS
- ALLOW_CASHOUT
- ALLOW_ECOMMERCE
- ALLOW_MAG_STRIPE

**Allowed actions for plastic card**:
- Contactless payments (true/false)
- Cashless (true/false)
- Online transactions (true/false)
- Mag stripe (true/false)

**Allowed actions for virtual card**:
- Online transactions (true/false)

get.summary: Check preconditions before changing card security parameter.
get.description:
Service gets all preconditions before changing security parameter

- ALLOW_ECOMMERCE
    - If card contract *created3dsPassword = false*, then need to set 3d secure password
- ALLOW_CASHOUT
    - Always returns *preconditions* empty
- ALLOW_CONTACTLESS
    - Always returns *preconditions* empty
- ALLOW_MAG_STRIPE
    - Always returns *preconditions* empty

post.description: Service unblocks card only if card status (stopCause - STOPPED). cardId - card id in PC

Service unloads card current account to organization prefunding account cardId = card id in PC (Processing Center). cardId is mandatory path parameter. password is mandatory request body parameter Unload confirm card service validations: - Service validates card contract found by **cardId** status: Card status must be ACTIVE or LOCKED or READY_TO_ACTIVATE - Service gets issued two factory token - Service validates token with **password** - Service validates current account linked with card found by **cardId**: - Service checks if current account is ACTIVE - Service checks if current account is not blocked for credit/all operations - Service validates if current account party is not suspended, blocked or persona non grata. - Service checks if **prefundingAccount** is provided in current account product - Service validates prefundingAccount: - Service checks if prefundingAccount is ACTIVE - Service checks if prefundingAccount is not blocked for debit/all operations - Service validates if prefunding account holder party is not suspended, blocked or persona non grata. - Service checks if there are enough funds in current account - Service makes a payment from current account to prefunding account

put.summary: Send SMS OTP to card holder for card unload
put.description: Service sends SMS OTP to card holder for card unload cardId = card id in PC (Processing Center). cardId is mandatory path parameter. amount is mandatory request body parameter: -value is mandatory parameter -currency is mandatory parameter Unload init card service validations: - Service validates card contract found by **cardId** status: Card status must be ACTIVE or LOCKED or READY_TO_ACTIVATE - Service validates current account linked with card found by **cardId**: - Service checks if current account is ACTIVE - Service checks if current account is not blocked for credit/all operations - Service validates if current account party is not suspended, blocked or persona non grata. - Service checks if **prefundingAccount** is provided in current account product - Service validates prefundingAccount: - Service checks if prefundingAccount is ACTIVE - Service checks if prefundingAccount is not blocked for debit/all operations - Service validates if prefunding account holder party is not suspended, blocked or persona non grata. - Service validates if **amount** is positive - Service checks if there are enough funds in current account - Service issues a two factory token - Service sends token value to card contract holder - Service checks if token value successfully sent - Service returns token details

parameters.name: operationId
parameters.description: ID of operation that must should be confirmed by end user

post.summary:
IbUser, IbContract creation for party after /registration/signup party status:"SUSPENDED" and manually updated party status to "ACTIVE" by AML

Endpoint does the following steps:

  • Creates IbUser
  • Creates IbContract
  • Adds IbUser to IbContract

Continue suspended service validations:

  • CrmParty basic info, addresses, contact details, id document, compliance level
post.description:
IbUser, IbContract creation for party after /registration/signup party status:"SUSPENDED" and manually updated party status to "ACTIVE" by AML

Endpoint does the following steps:

  • Creates IbUser
  • Creates IbContract
  • Adds IbUser to IbContract

Continue suspended service validations:

  • CrmParty basic info, addresses, contact details, id document, compliance level

post.summary: CrmParty, IbUser, IbContract registration in one step.
post.description:
CrmParty, IbUser, IbContract registration in one step.

Endpoint does following steps:

  • Creates CrmParty
  • Updates CrmParty addresses
  • Updates CrmParty contact details
  • Updates CrmParty id document
  • Completes CrmParty registration
  • Concludes Customer Agreement
  • Updates CrmParty compliance level into "1"
  • Creates IbUser (if service configuration parameter in Mongo createIbUserAndIbContract = true)
  • Creates IbContract (if service configuration parameter in Mongo createIbUserAndIbContract = true)
  • Adds IbUser to IbContract

communicationLanguage valid values:

  • lt
  • en
  • ru
  • de
  • fr
  • et
  • lv
  • pl
  • uk
  • be
  • zh
  • es

identityDocument.type valid values:

  • PASSPORT
  • ID_CARD
  • RESIDENCE_PERMIT

politicallyExposedPosition is mandatory if politicallyExposed = true

correspondenceAddress is mandatory if useResidentialAddressForCorrespondence = false

correspondenceAddress is not mandatory and will be the same as residentialAddress if useResidentialAddressForCorrespondence = true

termsAndConditionsAccepted must be true if this field is provided

Available politicallyExposedPosition values:

  • HEAD_OF_STATE
  • PARLIAMENT_MEMBER
  • JUDGE
  • MAYOR
  • AUDITOR_MEMBER
  • STATE_ENTERPRISE_MEMBER
  • MUNICIPALITY_ENTERPRISE_MEMBER
  • HEAD_OF_INTERNATIONAL_ORGANIZATION
  • HEAD_OF_POLITICAL_PARTY
  • DIPLOMAT

One step sign up service validations:

  • Service validates CrmParty uniqueness in the system
  • Service validates provided basic info, addresses, contact details, id document
  • Service validates CrmParty compliance level

additionalProperties.description: List of available funds by currency

availableFunds.description: List of available funds by currency

operationType.description: Internal identification of the operation type

paymentId.description: Unique payment identification in the system

runningBalance.description: Account balance when payment is completed.

hasMore.description: Indication if the set has more records

CardConfirmUnloadResponse.description: - operationId is payment entry id - status is payment status

CardLoadResponse.description: - operationId is payment entry id - status is payment status

arguments.description:
Additional message attributes.
Contains a list of key value argument pairs, that should help to build custom error message.

code.description: Message code, for error messages indicating error code

debugInfo.description: Detailed technical info related to message. Not present in PRODUCTION mode!

details.description: Long explanation text containing detailed information about this message

level.description:
Message severity level
  • ERROR - this level indicates that something went wrong or incorrect data was passed.
  • WARNING - this level indicates that request was successful but there is something that requires attention. For example that payment was stopped by AML and user need to provide additional information to the institution for further processing.
  • INFO - this level indicates that request was successful but there is some additional information about the outcome. For example, payment will be executed next business day.
  • SUCCESS - this level indicates that request was successful and there is some additional information about the outcome. Duplicates the INFO level, but could be used to display other colour in the information block.

location.description:
Name of the request parameter / attribute that caused the problem.
Note that full path of nested attributes is returned in arguments.fieldPath

message.description: Message text (human readable explanation of event)

source.description: Source of the message, may indicate system or sub-system, or event third party systems if they were the true cause of the message occurrence

timestamp.description: Date and time when event that created this message occurred in the system

authorizedPersonIds.description: List of party ID for authorized persons

items.description: List of party ID for authorized persons

jointHolderPartyIds.description: List of party IDs for joint holder

items.description: List of party IDs for joint holder

hasMore.description: Indication if the set has more records

results.merchantCategoryCodeDescription: Airlines, Air Carriers ( not listed elsewhere)

birthCountry.description: Parameter is mandatory or optional depending on the fieldSettings.

birthdate.description: Parameter is mandatory or optional depending on the fieldSettings.

citizenship.description: Parameter is mandatory or optional depending on the fieldSettings.

personalCode.description: For [LT] citizenship, field is always mandatory, for other countries', field is mandatory or optional depending on the fieldSettings.

taxCountries.description: Parameter is mandatory or optional depending on the fieldSettings.

correlationId.description: UUID that is generated while accepting request and passed down through all the system and returned in response.

hasErrorMessage.description: Indicator if there are messages with error level

responseId.description: UUID that is generated in the system and is unique for each response

ResponseMetadata.description: Main object containing all response metadata information

TaxCountry.description: Parameter is mandatory or optional depending on the fieldSettings.
